facts.content: FibreFlow and VF OneMap use separate Firebase projects - cannot authenticate across them without service account
facts.category: FibreFlow and VF OneMap use separate Firebase projects - cannot authenticate across them without service account

facts.content: VF OneMap uses Firebase project: vf-onemap
facts.category: VF OneMap uses Firebase project: vf-onemap

facts.content: Storage uploads must use the same project's bucket as the authentication
facts.category: Storage uploads must use the same project's bucket as the authentication

facts.content: When encountering cross-project authentication issues, fix the root cause by updating storage configuration to match the authentication project
facts.category: When encountering cross-project authentication issues, fix the root cause by updating storage configuration to match the authentication project

facts.content: Memory system documentation is in CLAUDE.md (quick ref) and .claude/MEMORY_SYSTEM_GUIDE.md (full guide)
facts.category: Memory system documentation is in CLAUDE.md (quick ref) and .claude/MEMORY_SYSTEM_GUIDE.md (full guide)

facts.content: Memory system uses Zep-inspired methodology: Facts (discrete info), Patterns (reusable solutions), Knowledge Graph (relationships), Sessions (dev summaries)
facts.category: Memory system uses Zep-inspired methodology: Facts (discrete info), Patterns (reusable solutions), Knowledge Graph (relationships), Sessions (dev summaries)

facts.content: Memory system v2 adds conflict detection, time relevance, category management, and prevents duplicate/conflicting memories
facts.category: Memory system v2 adds conflict detection, time relevance, category management, and prevents duplicate/conflicting memories

facts.content: Memory review is manual and intelligent - use 'review' command with criteria (all/duplicates/outdated/unused) instead of auto-archiving by age
facts.category: Memory review is manual and intelligent - use 'review' command with criteria (all/duplicates/outdated/unused) instead of auto-archiving by age

routing.pattern: Use simple routes in app.routes.ts to avoid NG04002 errors
Nested lazy-loaded routes lose path context

firebase.pattern: Always use AngularFire methods, not direct Firebase SDK

storage.pattern: Check storage bucket configuration matches authentication project

errors.pattern: Firebase Storage: CORS errors when uploading from FibreFlow to VF OneMap bucket indicate cross-project auth issue

workflow.pattern: Before suggesting solutions, check: node .claude/memory-system.js context 'task description'
When user corrects approach, add: node .claude/memory-system.js fact 'lesson learned'
After finding good solution, add: node .claude/memory-system.js pattern category 'solution'

security.pattern: Firebase Admin SDK Security: When encountering 'service account credentials' error, use Firebase Client SDK with admin auth instead of Admin SDK. Alternatives: Firebase CLI for simple ops, service account for automation (keep secure). Full guide in CLAUDE.md section üîê

preferences.rule: Always ask before making architectural changes
Prefer simple solutions over complex ones
Never create server-side workarounds without permission
